leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-单细胞与空间组学生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→整合→聚类/轨迹→注释→可视化→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: R/Python生态 + 交互可视化 + pipelines

queries: [WEB] shiny app for single cell visualization github

tools.name: Cerebro
tools.one_line_profile: Data system for optimized deep learning model selection and training
tools.detailed_description: Cerebro is a data system designed to optimize deep learning model selection by enabling resource-efficient training of multiple models. It focuses on scalability and efficiency in machine learning workflows.

tools.name: scpca-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for processing Single-cell Pediatric Cancer Atlas data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed for processing single-cell RNA-seq data for the Single-cell Pediatric Cancer Atlas (ScPCA) Portal, handling alignment, quantification, and quality control.

tools.name: scbrowse
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive browser for single-cell ATAC-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web-based browser for visualizing and exploring single-cell ATAC-seq data, allowing users to inspect chromatin accessibility at single-cell resolution.

tools.name: cytomapper
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualization of highly multiplexed imaging data
tools.detailed_description: An R/Bioconductor package for visualizing highly multiplexed imaging data, such as Imaging Mass Cytometry (IMC), enabling spatial analysis of single-cell data.

tools.name: Spaco
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially constrained color profiling for spatial data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for spatially constrained color profiling to visualize single-cell resolution spatial data, enhancing the interpretation of spatial transcriptomics patterns.

tools.name: CrossTalkeR
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand-Receptor Analysis Visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package for analyzing and visualizing ligand-receptor interactions (cell-cell communication) from single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Single-cell Analysis Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform and pipeline for automated analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data, providing a user-friendly interface for processing and visualization.

tools.name: too-many-cells
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering and visualization of single-cell clade relationships
tools.detailed_description: A tool for clustering single cells and analyzing cell clade relationships using a tree-based approach with colorful visualizations to handle large datasets.

tools.name: tooManyCellsR
tools.one_line_profile: R wrapper for too-many-cells
tools.detailed_description: An R wrapper for the 'too-many-cells' tool, enabling R users to perform tree-based clustering and visualization of single-cell data.

tools.name: gEAR
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Expression Analysis Resource portal and viewer
tools.detailed_description: A data archive and visualization portal for gene expression data, supporting microarrays, bulk RNA-Seq, and single-cell RNA-Seq, facilitating multi-omics data exploration.

tools.name: MERmaid
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL-based viewer for spatially-resolved transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: A WebGL-based interactive viewer designed for exploring spatially-resolved transcriptomics data, such as MERFISH, enabling high-performance visualization of large spatial datasets.

tools.name: MUDAN
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-sample Unified Discriminant Analysis for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for analyzing single-cell RNA-seq data, focusing on multi-sample unified discriminant analysis to identify cell subpopulations and markers.

tools.name: Cerebro (Karpova-Lab)
tools.one_line_profile: System for wireless optogenetic stimulation
tools.detailed_description: A hardware and software system for wireless optogenetic stimulation, enabling precise control of neural activity in experimental settings.

tools.name: PHATE
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for high dimensional data using heat-diffusion
tools.detailed_description: PHATE (Potential of Heat-diffusion for Affinity-based Transition Embedding) is a dimensionality reduction and visualization tool that preserves both local and global data structure, optimized for single-cell data.

tools.name: SCViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Viewer for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A standalone viewer application for visualizing and exploring single-cell data.

tools.name: mosaic
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization package for Tapestri single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the tertiary analysis and visualization of single-cell DNA and protein data generated by the Mission Bio Tapestri Platform.

tools.name: scRAFIKI
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for scRNA-seq processing and cellxgene preparation
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for processing single-cell RNA-seq data, performing quality control, integration, and preparing results for visualization in cellxgene.

tools.name: omero-vitessce
tools.one_line_profile: OMERO.web plugin for Vitessce multimodal viewer
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for OMERO.web that integrates the Vitessce multimodal data viewer, allowing visualization of OME-TIFF images and AnnData directly within the OMERO platform.

tools.name: scMiko
tools.one_line_profile: R package for single-cell RNA-seq analysis extending Seurat
tools.detailed_description: An R package built on the Seurat framework offering extended workflows and visualization tools for single-cell RNA-seq analysis.

tools.name: SpatialOmicsOverlay
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for analyzing NanoString GeoMx DSP images
tools.detailed_description: An R package for analyzing and visualizing image data from the NanoString GeoMx Digital Spatial Profiler (DSP), facilitating spatial omics research.

tools.name: cellxgene-gateway
tools.one_line_profile: Gateway for serving multiple datasets with Cellxgene
tools.detailed_description: A gateway application that allows hosting and serving multiple datasets using the Cellxgene Server, facilitating the deployment of single-cell visualization portals.

tools.name: Matilda
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task framework for single-cell multimodal omics learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for single-cell multimodal omics data that performs multiple tasks including simulation, dimension reduction, visualization, classification, and feature selection.

tools.name: APackOfTheClones
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of clonal expansion via circle-packing
tools.detailed_description: An R package extending scRepertoire to visualize clonal expansion in single-cell data using circle-packing plots, providing an intuitive view of clone sizes.

tools.name: ShinyCell
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny Interactive Web Apps for Single-Cell Data
tools.detailed_description: An R package to easily create interactive Shiny web applications for visualizing single-cell RNA-seq data, facilitating data sharing and exploration.

tools.name: DO-MS
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A modular and extensible application for the visualization of mass spectrometry data and optimization of data acquisition parameters.

tools.name: Portal
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial domain translation for single-cell integration
tools.detailed_description: A method using adversarial domain translation networks for integrating large-scale atlas-level single-cell datasets, handling batch effects and biological variation.

tools.name: VISION
tools.one_line_profile: Signature Analysis and Visualization for Single-Cell RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for signature-based analysis and visualization of single-cell RNA-seq data, allowing users to interpret cellular heterogeneity through biological signatures.

tools.name: ggsc
tools.one_line_profile: Visualizing Single Cell and Spatial Transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing grammar of graphics extensions for visualizing single-cell and spatial transcriptomics data, simplifying the creation of complex plots.

tools.name: SCope
tools.one_line_profile: Fast visualization tool for large-scale single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A scalable web-based visualization tool designed for large-scale and high-dimensional single-cell datasets, enabling interactive exploration.

tools.name: scSTEM
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny app for visualizing and clustering genes in pseudotime
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny app-based R package for clustering and visualizing gene expression patterns along pseudotime trajectories in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: scExploreR
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny app for single cell omics data visualization
tools.detailed_description: An interactive Shiny application designed for the visualization and exploration of single-cell omics data.

tools.name: SeuratPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Packaging common Seurat analysis tasks for reproducible research
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper package that streamlines common Seurat analysis tasks to facilitate reproducible single-cell RNA-seq research workflows.

tools.name: spateo-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for 3D modeling of spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A web-based viewer application for visualizing 3D models and data derived from spatial transcriptomics analysis, part of the Spateo ecosystem.

tools.name: scShinyHub
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny app for single cell RNAseq experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny application for analyzing and visualizing single-cell RNA-seq experiments, featuring a plug-in structure for flexible integration of tools.

tools.name: SCelVis
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization of single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for the visualization and exploration of single-cell gene expression data, designed to be user-friendly and interactive.

tools.name: SIMLR_PY
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of SIMLR for single-cell visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Single-cell Interpretation via Multi-kernel Learning (SIMLR) algorithm, designed for dimension reduction, clustering, and visualization of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: celldega
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial omics analysis and visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for the analysis and visualization of spatial omics data, developed by the Broad Institute.

tools.name: scp-ingest-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: File Ingest Pipeline for Single Cell Portal
tools.detailed_description: The backend pipeline used by the Broad Institute's Single Cell Portal to ingest, validate, and process single-cell data files for visualization and storage.

tools.name: single_cell_portal_core
tools.one_line_profile: Core application for the Broad Institute's Single Cell Portal
tools.detailed_description: The core Rails/Docker application powering the Broad Institute's Single Cell Portal, enabling visualization and sharing of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: cytomarker
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive design and validation of antibody panels using single-cell atlases
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the interactive design and validation of antibody panels, leveraging single-cell atlases to optimize panel selection.

tools.name: cellxgene
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive explorer for single-cell transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows biologists to explore single-cell transcriptomics datasets interactively, visualizing high-dimensional data in the browser.

tools.name: cellxgene-census
tools.one_line_profile: API for accessing CZ CELLxGENE Discover Census data
tools.detailed_description: A Python/R API and library to efficiently query and access the CZ CELLxGENE Discover Census, a massive collection of single-cell data.

tools.name: single-cell-data-portal
tools.one_line_profile: Data portal for submission and exploration of cellxgene datasets
tools.detailed_description: The web platform code supporting the submission, management, and exploration of single-cell datasets for the CELLxGENE project.

tools.name: singleCellTK
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive analysis and visualization of single cell genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package for the analysis and visualization of single-cell RNA-seq data, providing a toolkit for quality control, clustering, and differential expression.

tools.name: dbMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Dimensionality reduction based on diffusion harmonics
tools.detailed_description: A fast and modularized dimensionality reduction approach based on diffusion harmonics and graph layouts, scalable to millions of samples for clustering and visualization.

tools.name: topometry
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold learning and evaluation from high-dimensional data
tools.detailed_description: A framework to systematically learn and evaluate manifolds from high-dimensional data, useful for single-cell data analysis and topology preservation.

tools.name: DrEdGE
tools.one_line_profile: Differential Expression Gene Explorer
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for exploring differential expression gene data, allowing users to visualize and interact with gene expression datasets.

tools.name: dittoSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Color blindness friendly visualization of single-cell and bulk RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to provide color blindness friendly visualizations for single-cell and bulk RNA-sequencing data.

tools.name: atlas-web-single-cell
tools.one_line_profile: Single Cell Expression Atlas web application
tools.detailed_description: The web application source code for the EBI Single Cell Expression Atlas, facilitating the exploration of single-cell expression data.

tools.name: SCpubr
tools.one_line_profile: Publication ready visualizations for single cell transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: An R package to generate high-quality, publication-ready visualizations for single-cell transcriptomics data, streamlining the creation of complex plots.

tools.name: dea_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for differential expression analysis using Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow module for performing differential expression analyses on single-cell RNA-seq data, powered by the Seurat R package.

tools.name: mixscape_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for CRISPR screen analysis using Seurat Mixscape
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow module for analyzing pooled CRISPR screens with single-cell RNA-seq readout using Seurat's Mixscape method.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for scRNA-seq processing using Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow module for processing and visualizing single-cell RNA-seq data (10X or MTX format) using the Seurat R package.

tools.name: SGS
tools.one_line_profile: Browser for visualizing single-cell and spatial multiomics data
tools.detailed_description: SGS is a user-friendly, collaborative and versatile browser designed for visualizing single-cell and spatial multiomics data.

tools.name: GO-PCA
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised method to explore gene expression data using prior knowledge
tools.detailed_description: GO-PCA is an unsupervised method that explores gene expression data using prior knowledge from Gene Ontology to identify biologically relevant patterns.

tools.name: GenoCraft
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for high-throughput omics data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: GenoCraft is a comprehensive, user-friendly web platform designed for the analysis and visualization of high-throughput omics data.

tools.name: WebAtlas
tools.one_line_profile: Application to display spatial and single-cell experiment data
tools.detailed_description: An application built on the Vitessce framework to display and interact with spatial and single-cell experiment data.

tools.name: iSEE
tools.one_line_profile: R/Shiny interface for interactive visualization of SummarizedExperiment objects
tools.detailed_description: iSEE provides an R/Shiny interface for the interactive visualization of data stored in SummarizedExperiment objects, commonly used in bioconductor workflows.

tools.name: cellxgene VIP
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin for cellxgene to generate high-resolution plots and perform differential analysis
tools.detailed_description: cellxgene VIP enables cellxgene to generate various high-resolution plots (violin, heatmap, volcano, etc.) and perform differential gene expression analysis.

tools.name: Clustergrammer2
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL-based interactive heatmap visualization tool for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: Clustergrammer2 is a dimensionality-increasing data visualization tool and interactive WebGL Jupyter widget built specifically for single-cell data exploration.

tools.name: Visium Clustergrammer2
tools.one_line_profile: Dashboard for spatial transcriptomics visualization
tools.detailed_description: A spatial transcriptomics dashboard leveraging Clustergrammer2 for interactive visualization of Visium data.

tools.name: AtlasRDF-R
tools.one_line_profile: R package for exploring and analysing Gene Expression Atlas RDF data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for exploring and analysing data from the Gene Expression Atlas using RDF (Resource Description Framework).

tools.name: Iscandar
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive reporting tool for single cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: Iscandar is an interactive reporting tool designed to facilitate the exploration and visualization of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: ST Viewer
tools.one_line_profile: GUI tool for visualisation and analysis of Spatial Transcriptomics datasets
tools.detailed_description: A GUI tool developed in C++ for easy and smooth visualisation and analysis of Spatial Transcriptomics datasets.

tools.name: Ragas
tools.one_line_profile: R tools for analysis and visualization of single-cell subclustering data
tools.detailed_description: Ragas provides R tools for the analysis and visualization of single-cell subclustering data.

tools.name: CellChat
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for inference, visualization, and analysis of cell-cell communication
tools.detailed_description: CellChat is an R toolkit for inference, visualization, and analysis of cell-cell communication from single-cell and spatially resolved transcriptomics data.

tools.name: kana
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based single cell analysis application using WebAssembly
tools.detailed_description: Kana performs single cell analysis directly in the browser using WebAssembly, enabling efficient client-side data processing.

tools.name: VisCello
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for single cell data
tools.detailed_description: VisCello is a tool designed for the visualization of single cell data.

tools.name: scPlot
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive plotting tools for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: scPlot provides interactive plotting tools for single-cell data analysis.

tools.name: scSVA
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable visualization and analytics tool for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: Single-cell Scalable Visualization and Analytics (scSVA) is a tool for analyzing and visualizing large-scale single-cell datasets.

tools.name: canceR
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to explore and analyze cancer data from MSKCC
tools.detailed_description: The canceR package provides a user-friendly interface based on cgdsr to explore, compare, and analyse cancer data hosted by MSKCC.

tools.name: scrnaseq-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for single-cell RNA-seq analysis using Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for performing single-cell RNA-seq analysis utilizing the Seurat package.

tools.name: Cirrocumulus
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for large-scale single-cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: Cirrocumulus is a tool designed to bring single-cell data to life through interactive visualization, capable of handling large-scale datasets.

tools.name: Loom Viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for browsing and visualizing single-cell data in Loom format
tools.detailed_description: Loom Viewer is a tool for sharing, browsing, and visualizing single-cell data stored in the Loom file format.

tools.name: scDVA
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny tool for single cell RNA-seq data visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: scDVA is an R Shiny-based tool used for the visualization and analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: UCSC Cell Browser
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline and Javascript library for visualizing single-cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: UCSC Cell Browser is a Python pipeline and Javascript scatter plot library for creating interactive visualizations of single-cell datasets.

tools.name: CellAgentChat
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-based model for inference and visualization of cell-cell communication
tools.detailed_description: CellAgentChat is a Python agent-based model tool for the inference, visualization, and analysis of cell-cell communication from single-cell data.

tools.name: CellView
tools.one_line_profile: App to visualize single cell datasets
tools.detailed_description: CellView is a simple application designed to visualize single cell datasets.

tools.name: ggseurat
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization wrapper allowing Seurat objects to be plotted with ggplot2
tools.detailed_description: ggseurat provides methods to allow Seurat objects to be visualized using the ggplot2 framework in R.

tools.name: cellxgenedp
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to the cellxgene data portal
tools.detailed_description: cellxgenedp provides an R interface to access and interact with the cellxgene data portal.

tools.name: NASQAR
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for high-throughput sequencing data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: NASQAR is a web-based platform designed for the analysis and visualization of high-throughput sequencing data.

tools.name: SeuratV3Wizard
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive wizard for guided single-cell RNA-seq analysis based on Seurat
tools.detailed_description: SeuratV3Wizard is a web-based interactive application that performs a guided single-cell RNA-seq data analysis and clustering based on Seurat v3.

tools.name: single-cell-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: R package to visualize scRNA sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: single-cell-viewer is an R package designed to visualize single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: VorteX
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical tool for single-cell analysis, clustering, and visualization
tools.detailed_description: VorteX is a Java-based graphical tool (Clustering Environment) for single-cell analysis, clustering, and visualization.

tools.name: GenExVis
tools.one_line_profile: Application for exploring and visualizing differential gene expression data
tools.detailed_description: GenExVis is an application for exploring and visualizing differential gene expression data created with DESeq2.

tools.name: STREAM
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for single-cell trajectory reconstruction, exploration, and mapping
tools.detailed_description: STREAM (Single-cell Trajectories Reconstruction, Exploration And Mapping) is a tool for analyzing single-cell data to reconstruct and explore developmental trajectories.

tools.name: BellaVista
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for interactive visualization of imaging-based spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: BellaVista is a Python package designed for the interactive visualization of imaging-based spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: Nebulosa
tools.one_line_profile: Gene expression visualization tool using weighted kernel density estimation
tools.detailed_description: An R package to visualize gene expression data based on weighted kernel density estimation, allowing for the recovery of signals from dropped-out features in single-cell data.

tools.name: CReSCENT
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer Single Cell Expression Toolkit for analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A collection of one-line-command applications for cancer single-cell expression analysis, serving as the backend toolkit for the CReSCENT portal.

tools.name: scplotter
tools.one_line_profile: Easy and efficient visualization for single-cell sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: An R package built upon plotthis that provides a set of functions to visualize single-cell sequencing data, streamlining the creation of common single-cell plots.

tools.name: iCellR
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative toolkit for multi-omics single-cell analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: An interactive R package designed to facilitate the analysis and visualization of high-throughput single-cell sequencing data, supporting scRNA-seq, scVDJ-seq, scATAC-seq, CITE-Seq, and Spatial Transcriptomics.

tools.name: Cerebro
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization application for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A standalone application (Electron-based) for visualizing single-cell RNA-seq data, allowing users to explore clusters, gene expression, and trajectories interactively without coding.

tools.name: cerebroApp
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for exporting data to the Cerebro visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: An R package that prepares and exports single-cell analysis results (e.g., from Seurat) into the format required by the Cerebro visualization application.

tools.name: scCustomize
tools.one_line_profile: Customized visualization and analysis functions for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a collection of functions created and curated to improve the visualization and analysis of single-cell data, often extending Seurat's capabilities.

tools.name: napari-spatialdata
tools.one_line_profile: Napari plugin for interactive visualization of spatial omics data
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the napari image viewer that enables interactive visualization of spatial omics data, integrating with the SpatialData framework in the scverse ecosystem.

tools.name: DigitalCellSorter
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for cell type identification and analysis in scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for single-cell RNA-seq analysis, focusing on digital cell sorting and annotation based on gene expression markers.

tools.name: GEfetch2R
tools.one_line_profile: Retriever for public single-cell and bulk RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package to access single-cell and bulk RNA-seq data from public repositories and benchmark subsequent format conversion tools.

tools.name: Cerebro Viewer
tools.one_line_profile: 3D viewer for brain and neuroimaging data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Pythonic 3D viewer designed to visualize and plot brains and neuroimaging data, facilitating the exploration of complex neurological structures.

tools.name: CellGuide
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based navigator for single-cell RNA-seq datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool to navigate and explore single-cell RNA-seq datasets directly in a web browser, providing an interactive interface for data dissemination.

tools.name: CellChat
tools.one_line_profile: Inference and analysis of cell-cell communication
tools.detailed_description: An R toolkit for inference, visualization, and analysis of cell-cell communication networks from single-cell data, utilizing ligand-receptor interaction databases.

tools.name: CuratedAtlasQueryR
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for querying the CELLxGENE single-cell atlas
tools.detailed_description: A Tidy R query API for accessing and filtering data from the harmonized and curated CELLxGENE single-cell atlas.

tools.name: ShinyCell2
tools.one_line_profile: Builder for interactive single-cell multi-omics web apps
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight R package for building interactive, shareable Shiny apps to explore single-cell multi-omics, scATAC-seq, and spatial transcriptomics data.

tools.name: easy_vitessce
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified configuration for Vitessce visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to configure Vitessce visualizations using existing Scverse plotting APIs, making it easier to generate interactive spatial plots.

tools.name: Vitessce
tools.one_line_profile: Visual integration tool for spatial single-cell exploration
tools.detailed_description: A modular, web-based visual integration tool for the exploration of spatial single-cell experiments, supporting various data formats and multi-modal integration.

tools.name: vitessce-data
tools.one_line_profile: Data loading utilities for Vitessce and HuBMAP formats
tools.detailed_description: Utility library for loading HuBMAP data formats and other sample datasets for use with the Vitessce visualization framework.

tools.name: vitessce-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python API and Jupyter widget for Vitessce
tools.detailed_description: The Python interface for Vitessce, allowing users to create and embed interactive spatial single-cell visualizations directly within Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: vitessceR
tools.one_line_profile: R API and htmlwidget for Vitessce
tools.detailed_description: The R interface for Vitessce, providing an htmlwidget to embed interactive spatial single-cell visualizations in R Markdown and Shiny applications.

tools.name: mzkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for mass spectrometry and metabolomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive data toolkit for processing NMR, MALDI MSI, MALDI single cell, Raman Spectroscopy, LC-MS, and GC-MS raw data, including chemoinformatics analysis and visualization.

tools.name: GenoMap
tools.one_line_profile: Cartography of genomic interactions for single-cell analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool enabling deep analysis of single-cell expression data through the cartography of genomic interactions, as described in Nature Communications (2023).

tools.name: Scillus
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for Seurat to streamline single-cell processing
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to streamline the processing and visualization of single-cell datasets, providing enhanced utilities on top of the Seurat ecosystem.

tools.name: trackplot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for NGS tracks and single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing various next-generation sequencing (NGS) data, including DNA-seq, RNA-seq, and single-cell RNA-seq, generating publication-quality track plots.

tools.name: Millefy
tools.one_line_profile: Genome browser-like visualization for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for genome browser-like visualization of single-cell RNA-seq datasets, allowing for the inspection of read coverage across genomic coordinates in single cells.
